dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: Alright! We're in! I knew my practice climbing chain link fences would be useful someday!

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: They're gonna kick us out they're gonna kick us out they're gonna kick us out--

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: Only if you keep acting like we're not supposed to be here.

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: It's fiiiine, not like anyone's using this stage anyway!

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Maybe this was stupid. Is anyone even going to hear us?

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: I mean, that's Everett Price performing on the main stage. Who's going to bother with us...?

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: Probably nobody, but we can say we tried. And hey, maybe Fayruz's weird plan will actually work.

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: My plan is genius!!! There's already a huge crowd of music-lovers here trying to decide which of CC's acts to see next. At least a couple of 'em have to stream in once they hear how absolutely sick we are!

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: They will listen, Sonu. And if they don't, we keep on playing until they do!
